songs.title: So
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Ed Sheeran]
Filled up with doubt
I have to move home
But I want to stay with you
For all of the summer
I have my plan
That you won't remember
If you want to see the world
Then please ask your mother

[Bridge 1: Ed Sheeran]
I cannot hold your hand to watch you go
I am a liar, as you might know

[Pre-Hook: Ed Sheeran]
I need you now
I need your touch and your lips
I need your smile and your kiss

[Hook: Ed Sheeran]
You're so cool
You're so beautiful
You're so
And you're so
You're so cool
You're so beautiful
You're so
And you're so

[Verse 2: Ed Sheeran]
I see your grace
From my window
When it is late at night
It'll show me your shadow
I'm in my place
I hope you remember
When summer is gone, I'll still sing a song
Of you in September

[Bridge 1: Ed Sheeran]
I cannot hold your hand to watch you go
I am a liar, as you might know

[Pre-Hook: Ed Sheeran]
I need you now
I need your touch and your lips
I need that smile and your kiss

[Hook: Ed Sheeran]
You're so cool
You're so beautiful
You're so
And you're so
You're so cool
You're so beautiful
You're so
And you're so
You're so cool
You're so beautiful
You're so
And you're so
You're so cool
You're so beautiful
You're so
And you're so

[Bridge 2:Ed Sheeran]
These words I say mean
You’re so amazing
I've noticed lately
I need you, maybe
These words I say mean
You’re so amazing
I've noticed lately
I need you, maybe

[Hook]
You're so cool
You're so beautiful
You're so
And you're so
You're so cool
You're so beautiful
You're so
And you're so
